Posts.Content: ladybugcyndi wrote: I had taxotere and cytoxan from 2/08 to 5/08.  I had the typical nail changes, colors and lifting.  It has been 22 months post treatment and now, again, I am having some pretty funky nails.  I completely lost a toenail about 3 months ago, just out of the blue it lifted and came off.  Now, I have noticed that 2 nails on each hand have lifted about halfway up.  They aren't painful, just ugly as sin.  I'm due to go back in for an oncology appointment and will definately talk about it then.  I'm just wondering if anyone else has had similar issues? My mother is my hero, I hope I handle BC with the same courage and dignity she handled lung cancer. Dx 1/31/2008, IDC, <1cm, Stage I, Grade 3, 0/2 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Nail Changes, 22 months post treatments.. ladybugcyndi NatsFan
